Sergio Marchionne also reminded employees that it was with the assistance of the federal government of Ontario that Chrysler has been given an opportunity to create a future. Chrysler Group owes a deep debt of gratitude to taxpayers in Canada and the U.S. for the loans that enabled a reenergized, restructured company to emerge in June 2009, said Sergio Marchionne .`` We recognize we have a moral responsibility to fulfill our promises, justify these investments and pay back every penny that was loaned to us.'' Mike Pence said this was his first town hall since the Tucson, Ariz., shootings and he always consults with local law enforcement on security at such events. To me the focus is and should remain on public safety. We volunteer for these jobs, but just because someone comes to a town hall meeting, they should never have to be concerned that there's not a reasonable amount of security, he said. He said town hall meetings are`` very routine'' for him and said he was grateful that everyone came out Monday in the wake of the Tucson shootings. Previous article Grand jury
